alert.note: Alert for Niagara; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Erie and Niagara Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Niagara Falls to near Evangola State Park. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause minor flooding in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, Niagara Falls, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Clarence, Lockport, Lackawanna, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Lancaster, Hamburg, East Aurora, Williamsville, Grand Island, Evans, Elma and Newfane. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
